<title level="1" right="Action">[Bear Hug](/Actions.aspx?ID=15) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 215 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements** The bear’s last action was a successful claw Strike.

</column>

---

The bear makes another claw Strike against the same target. If this Strike hits, the target is also [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20), as if the bear had successfully [Grappled](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) the target.
